attributes.action: David Cameron must take part in televised debates for the in / out referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Full and frank information from both sides of the campaign must be debated in order for the electorate to reach a decision to vote for what will most likely be the most important vote of their lifetime.  Mr Cameron, as Prime Minister, you need to tell the electorate why we should remain in the EU but you need to argue your case with the Leave campaign so we the electorate have all the facts to make our decision.
attributes.background: David Cameron has privately ruled out taking part in any televised debates which includes representatives from the Leave campaign as he does not believe it will help his campaign to Remain .If this is to be a fair and equal referendum , David Cameron must be involved to fight his cause .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the Prime Minister and the broadcasters, and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
